channel.title: miljko tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from miljko.

item.description: üß™ For the five people out there who are interested in T-cell malignancies, one of the last papers we wrote with Dr. Waldmann is now out as early access at Blood Advances. It is a modest phase 1 trial of IL-15 and Campath with interesting results. https://t.co/8uMGIEXjkp https://t.co/w2BdEhYuiI
@barttels2 Nah. He struck a good tone: amusement and befuddlement, not fire and brimstone.

@DavidSteensma @AaronGoodman33 We are taking it way overboard. Imagine a diagram aliens make of different Davids in the world: this is the pajama-wearing David (PWD), this is a David in a suit (DIS), and look here, there‚Äôs even a sub- population that doesn‚Äôt have any surface markers!
‚ÄúThere can be found, inside every American, a miniature Puritan yearning to grow large and seize control.‚Äù Martin Gurri tells it like it is. https://t.co/Gz78SZRkDT
@DrAnanda4 Calculated Risks, at @stradijanizam's rec https://t.co/vZkwf7zno8 The highlights should be a part of every med school curriculum.

@alexeyguzey Yep. With all of its shortcomings (and I‚Äôve experienced many of them) US is still the most immigrant-friendly developed country But a big problem in both countries is buying up of real estate by people who have no intention of immigrating there What‚Äôs their definition of foreign?
@stradijanizam Hah, da, konaƒçno! Ovim tempom proƒçitaƒáu sve planirano za oko 30 godina, ali ≈°ta onda?

üìö Starting the morning with some Gerd Gigerenzer. Hope he doesn‚Äôt get into trouble for implying the media and health agencies are spreading disinformation. Oh, who am I kidding? It‚Äôs in a book, no one will see it. https://t.co/baloJXlzaf

@oncology_bg @FDAOncology @BijoyTelivala You made a general point about RCTs being the default for approval. I agree with that. However, some lymphoma drugs have received full approval without randomized data. So with this response from ODAC, the message to sponsors of PI3Kis is that they shouldn‚Äôt even try asking.
@oncology_bg @FDAOncology @BijoyTelivala It‚Äôs a valid question. PI3Ki are being tested for indications that had full approvals based on single-arm studies. Glad it was asked & answered.
Zeynep Tufekci on missed opportunities: https://t.co/JbGuwO4kRu
Alan Jacobs on science and politics: https://t.co/GSOxPj8XAo
‚ÄúWhatever its flaws, the NBA is one of the more functional institutions in American society.‚Äù Yes! And Jokiƒá is the MVP. https://t.co/Slcty5qHPt
The Good Science Project is underselling how good it is. More like this, please. (signatures below the manifesto are a good ‚Äî heh ‚Äî example of quality over quantity) https://t.co/f3XNOC9uyn

Beats any journal club you‚Äôll see this year. Ivo+aza is a devious study, conducted only outside the US for the express purpose of not having to deal with appropriate control arms and post-protocol Rx. Should not be used for US FDA approval. Then again, it doesn‚Äôt need it! Devious https://t.co/XzZCEs8wJb
Correction: 2 US locations. Out of 89 total. I'm sure the 2.2% of locations will translate into meaningful representation of all Americans. https://t.co/WllnUBsNbE

@Brian_Stoffel_ @nntaleb Also the reason for the ‚ÄúFlorida man‚Äù meme, which is the consequence of the state‚Äôs Sunshine Act making all police reports available to the media. No such law in California, no California man.
@aledeniz That's the one I ordered! https://t.co/Pzo36t7VR0
@Kimi83Matija Available in Serbia? Online ordering? Will try to have someone bring it over the next time they're visiting.
@Timothee_MD Heh, thanks! :)
@aledeniz Thanks! I didn't know about Sarelle until today, but there's a shipment on its way from Turkey now
@trishankkarthik Still better than some American spreadables! https://t.co/Vtbr7Gy7uh
@trishankkarthik More chocolate or more cocoa? The top 3 layers + some of the sugar are all chocolate :)
@AaronGoodman33 ‚ÄúAs seen in The Complete Idiot‚Äôs Guide to Making a Billion-Dollar Drug.‚Äù
Twitter-friendly controversies: https://t.co/LFopIuEzwd
Well this is a surprise. I expected way more sugar and only trace amounts of hazelnut. https://t.co/L8SES0IemI
